fullness.translation[0].definitions[0].d: the quality of being large and round in an attractive way
fullness.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Use a red gloss on your bottom lip to give it fullness.
fullness.translation[0].definitions[2].d: the quality of having a pleasantly strong taste or deep sound
fullness.translation[0].definitions[2].e: This recording has a fullness and warmth that brings out the brilliance of the piece.
fullness.translation[0].definitions[3].e: Do you have a feeling of fullness after even a small meal?
